modName: Evermoor Island - Unfinished Project ready for new owner
summary: An incomplete mod project of mine that will never get finished.
descriptionHtml:
Started this mod ages ago, alot of the landscape of "Evermoor Island" is done. Unfortunately not much else is. I haven't really got time to continue it any more and it seems a bit of a waste if I just delete it. 
You will need to download GKB Trees to see much of the forests; and grab some custom meshes and textures from me. 
The world is extremely detailed, but is missing some areas of landscape design. There is a few interiors, a castle, two towns and a port. There is also a central volcano that was going to be part of a quest. There are multiple bandit camps, cave enterences and possible dungeon locations.
If anyone does manage to make something out of this, I only ask that you please give credit to me for world design in your description. It has taken a lot of work to build a world on this scale! 

[b]THIS IS NOT AT ALL FINISHED, THIS IS FOR MODDERS ONLY![/b]
